import subprocess

        capture_output=True,
        text=True,

        model_cfg = self.config["models"].get(agent_name)
        
        if not model_cfg:

            return CheckpointRunner(model_cfg)
        elif model_type == "fine_tuned":
            return FineTunedRunner(model_cfg)
        else:
            raise ValueError(f"Unknown model type: {model_type}")
